history.proof: intros. simpl. apply Nat.le_trans with (m := k * x). - sfirstorder depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: apply Nat.le_trans with (m := k * x) in H2.

original: intros x y H1 H2. apply Hk1 in H2. apply Nat.le_trans with (m := k * x) in H2. - simpl. apply Nat.le_trans with (m := k * x). apply H2. apply Nat.mul_le_mono_l. apply Nat.le_succ_diag_r. - apply H2.
